page.title: 19A Local Building Firm.
page.content: F.K.Wilkins and Sons is a local building firm in Hilmarton, which was started by Frank Wilkins but today is run by his son Melvyn. Melvyn's day can start at 07.30 and runs until about 17.30., or later in the summer. He may even receive emergency calls before he leaves in the morning. During the day he could be doing a variety of jobs.He could be erecting scaffolding for the re-building of a chimney, building a Victorian style conservatory at a local inn, attending to a leaking cattle trough, six fields away from the nearest hard road, unblocking the drains at the local vicarage or erecting cat walks to a grain dryer installation 40 feet above the ground. In the evenings he has time to work in his office, at home, on estimates and accounts or, in the summer, he might continue on a job.
